Washington.html#top |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 1512530
|website = |footnotes = }} 'Opportunity' is a former census-designated place in
Spokane County, Washington, United States. The population was 25,065 at the 2000
census. The area has been a city neighborhood of Spokane Valley since the city
incorporated in 2003.
